data.description: Beautiful well maintain spacious 3 bedroom ranch, with large bonus room above the 2 car garage, Situated in a peaceful neighborhood. Brand new roof and gutters with transferable warranty. New water heater, large master bedroom with trey ceilings and a sitting area, walk-in closet, bathroom featuring a large soaking tub with separate shower. Outdoors, you'll find a private backyard with lovely patio area. Large workshop / storage shed, Located just minutes from downtown Covington, close to all the amenities the town has to offer, including restaurants, shopping, schools and entertainment.
